Content: Act 2 The road of silver: The civil war that started in Act 1 starts
to affect the trade routs, drawing in the major trade guilds. A small
trade guild lead by Markus Crassus sees this as a chance to take over
parts of the marked abandoned by the bigger tradeguilds now
concentrating on the war effort. The player palys a trading
